note:
I geek, therefore I am.

I am, in no particular order, a parent, a nerd, a maker, a musician, an explorer, a techie, a juggler, a camper, a hiker, a sailor, a movie nut, a pop culture junkie, a cohouser, an SF fan, a drone pilot, a mechanic, a jeepster, a sysadmin, a photographer, a retrocomputing geek, a programmer, a (former) SCCA driver, and a gamer.

"No one User wrote me! I'm worth millions of their man-years!"

Joined: June 4, 2021.
Migrated to fosstodon: November 22, 2022
